briefTitle: Implantable Cardioverter-Defibrillator Use in the VA System

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria: Inclusion Criteria:Meeting published criteria for receipt of an implantable cardioverter defibrillator Exclusion Criteria:provider is not affiliated with the VA health care system

outcomeMeasures.title: Referral for Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator
outcomeMeasures.description: Referral of the patient to electrophysiology clinic for evaluation for cardioverter defibrillator implantation.
